name: forkscout
description: Forkscout AI agent â€” Telegram + LLM + MCP + Tools

scripts.start: bun run stop; DEVTOOLS=1 bun run src/index.ts
scripts.start:bg: bun run stop; DEVTOOLS=1 nohup bun run src/index.ts >> /tmp/forkscout.log 2>&1 & echo "[forkscout] started in background (PID $!). Run: bun run logs"
scripts.dev: bun run stop; DEVTOOLS=1 bun --hot src/index.ts
scripts.cli: bun run stop; bun run src/index.ts --cli
scripts.cli:dev: bun run stop; DEVTOOLS=1 bun --hot src/index.ts --cli
scripts.restart: DEVTOOLS=1 nohup bun run src/index.ts > /tmp/forkscout.log 2>&1 & sleep 2 && bun run stop; echo '[forkscout] restarted'
scripts.restart:dev: DEVTOOLS=1 nohup bun --hot src/index.ts > /tmp/forkscout.log 2>&1 & sleep 2 && bun run stop; echo '[forkscout] restarted (hot)'
scripts.dev:tools: bun run stop; concurrently -k -n AGENT,DEVTOOLS -c cyan,yellow "DEVTOOLS=1 bun --hot src/index.ts" "node node_modules/@ai-sdk/devtools/bin/cli.js"
